projects.name: E-commerce Website
projects.description: Rooter Retreat is a e-commerce website I built using Javascript, HTML, CSS and Bootstrap.

projects.name: Temperature Converter
projects.description: This project is a temperature converter I made by using Javascript, HTML, CSS and Bootstrap. It converts any number entered into either Fahrenheit or Degress Celsuis.

projects.name: BMI Converter
projects.description: This project is a BMI Calculator I made by using Javascript, HTML, CSS and Bootstrap. It takes your weight and height and it calculates your BMI(Body Mass Index).

projects.name: Calculator
projects.description: This project is a Calculator that is fully functional and it was built using Javascript, HTML, CSS and Bootstrap.

projects.name: Tester Website
projects.description: This is one of the first projects I made. When making it I used HTML, CSS and Bootstrap.

projects.name: Bootstrap EOMP
projects.description: This porfolio was my first ever project which I used HTML, CSS and Bootstrap for.

testimonials.name: Rayhaan Khan
testimonials.title: Colleague
testimonials.quote: Ganiefah Majiet is the kindest-hearted and most dedicated woman I've ever met. She consistently manages to uplift the mood in a dark room and always strives to help everyone to the best of her ability. Once her mind is set on something, she ensures that she gives her utmost effort to excel. I highly recommend Ganiefah to everyone, as she would be a valuable addition to the workplace and is always seeking to improve.

testimonials.name: Laiquah Cotie
testimonials.title: Colleague
testimonials.quote: Ganiefah is a hard-worker. She never gives up and applies herself sometimes more than required. Its a pleasure to have her on your team as she is a good team player and works well under pressure. She gets thing done when its required. She has a helpful and jolly personality.

testimonials.name: Eighton-Lee Paulse
testimonials.title: Colleague
testimonials.quote: Ganiefah radiates vibrant and joyful energy. She is highly motivated in her work and puts her heart and soul into everything she does. Her personality is truly unique and enjoyable, and she shows great respect for everybody around her. Ganiefah brings only positive energy, always brightening up the mood wherever she goes. I wholeheartedly recommend her without hesitation.

testimonials.name: Nuraan Samodien
testimonials.title: Colleague
testimonials.quote: Ganiefah excels both in group settings and when working independently. She possesses the remarkable ability to adapt to any environment she finds herself in. Once you get to know her, you experience a genuine sense of belonging, as she welcomes you with warmth and kindness.Ganiefah's personality is wonderfully bubbly, making her a valuable addition to any workplace or business. When collaborating with a team, she is the go-to person for assistance, always willing to lend a hand. This willingness to help is an invaluable asset when working in a team.

testimonials.name: Mish-Al Taliep
testimonials.title: Colleague
testimonials.quote: What sets Ganiefah apart is not only her professional achievements but also her genuine compassion and empathy towards others. She has an innate ability to connect with people on a deep level and make them feel heard and valued. Her kindness and generosity know no bounds, and she is always willing to lend a helping hand or provide support to those in need. Ganiefah's presence alone has a way of uplifting and inspiring those around her.

testimonials.name: Uzukhanye Dywili
testimonials.title: Assistant Lecturer
testimonials.quote: Working with Ganiefah Majiet was an incredible experience. Their professionalism, attention to detail, and communication skills made the entire process seamless. They consistently exceeded my expectations and delivered exceptional results. I would highly recommend Ganiefah Majiet to anyone looking for a talented and dedicated professional.
